list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: pellets of frozen rain which fall in showers from cumulonimbus clouds.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: rain and hail bounced on the tiled roof
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mưa và mưa đá vang lên trên mái ngói

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a shout or call used to attract attention.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it hailed so hard we had to stop
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nó ca ngợi rất nhiều, chúng ta phải dừng lại

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a large number of objects) fall or be hurled forcefully.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: missiles and bombs hail down from the sky
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tên lửa và bom mưa đá xuống từ bầu trời

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: call out to (someone) to attract attention.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the crew hailed a fishing boat
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Phi hành đoàn ca ngợi một chiếc thuyền đánh cá

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: acclaim enthusiastically as being a specified thing.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he has been hailed as the new James Dean
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy đã được ca ngợi là James Dean mới

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: have one's home or origins in (a place).
